name: Psylocke
text: [star] Psi-Energy Control — Interrupt: When you use one of Psylocke's basic powers (THW, ATK, or DEF), flip 1 [[PSI-ENERGY]] upgrade.

name: Betsy Braddock
text: Psionic Manifestation — Setup: Put your 2 [[PSI-ENERGY]] upgrades into play, Psi-Knife side faceup. Action: Exhaust 1 [[PSI-ENERGY]] upgrade → shuffle 1 [[PSIONIC]] card from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Psi-Knife
text: Permanent. Psylocke gets +1 THW. Hero Resource: Exhaust Psi-Knife → generate a [mental] resource. You may flip this card.

name: Psi-Katana
text: Permanent. Restricted. Psylocke gets +1 ATK and her basic attacks gain piercing. Hero Resource: Exhaust Psi-Katana → generate a [physical] resource. You may flip this card.

name: Angel
text: Response: After you play Angel from your hand, ready your identity.

name: Flurry of Blades
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. For each Psi-Knife you control, choose an enemy and confuse it. For each Psi-Katana you control, choose an enemy and deal 2 damage to it.

name: Mental Detection
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 1 threat from a scheme. For each Psi-Knife you control, remove 2 additional threat from that scheme. For each Psi-Katana you control, draw 1 card.

name: Psionic Redirect
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an enemy attack, prevent 2 of that damage. For each Psi-Katana you control, prevent 2 additional damage. For each Psi-Knife you control, confuse that enemy.

name: Telepathic Suggestion
text: Hero Interrupt: When you reveal a card from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects. For each Psi-Katana you control, choose an enemy and deal 2 damage to it. For each Psi-Knife you control, choose a scheme and remove 1 threat from it.

name: Training Regimen
text: Action: Exhaust Training Regiment → search your deck for a [[SKILL]] card and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.) If you are in hero form, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Martial Arts Training
text: Psylocke gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After Psylocke defends against an attack, discard Martial Arts Training → ready Psylocke.

name: Psionic Training
text: Psylocke ignores the guard and patrol keywords. Hero Response: After Psylocke thwarts, discard Psionic Training → confuse an enemy.

name: Weapons Training
text: Psylocke gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After Psylocke attacks, discard Weapons Training → ready each [[WEAPON]] upgrade you control.

flavor: "I'll be your champion, now and forever."
name: Captain Britain
text: [star] Captain Britain takes -1 consequential damage after he thwarts a side scheme or attacks a minion.

flavor: "Your body language told me everything I needed to know to beat you."
name: Cypher
text: [star] Response: After Cypher attacks and damages a confused enemy, draw 1 card.

name: Upside the Head
text: Hero Response: After your hero makes a basic attack and damages an enemy, confuse that enemy. If that enemy is already confused, stun it instead.

flavor:
"You go low, I'll go high."
"I always go low."
"Fine, go high."
"I like going low."
 —Wolverine and Deadpool
name: Lay the Trap
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme deals 5[per_hero] damage to the villain.

name: Float Like a Butterfly
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When a character you control attacks a confused enemy, increase the amount of damage that attack deals to that enemy by 1.

name: Pete Wisdom
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-FORCE]] trait. Response: After you resolve the "When Revealed" effects of a treachery card, heal 1 damage from Pete Wisdom.

name: Directed Force
text: Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes an attack that has a keyword (overkill, piercing, or ranged), that attack deals 2 additional damage. (Max 1 per attack.)

name: Soaring Hearts
text: Team-Up (Angel and Psylocke). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Search your discard pile for an identity-specific event and add it to your hand. Ready Angel and Psylocke.

name: IPAC
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-FORCE]] trait. Hero Action: Exhaust IPAC and deal 1 facedown encounter card to a player → that player draws 2 cards.

name: X-Bunker
text: Action: Exhaust X-Bunker and choose a player whose identity has the [[MUTANT]] trait → that player searches the top X cards of their deck for any card, where X is the number of side schemes in the victory display, and adds that card to their hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Telepathy
text: Play only if your identity has the [[PSIONIC]] trait. Max 1 per player. Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust Telepathy and spend [mental][mental] resources → remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Psi-Bow Attack
text: Play only if your hero has the [[PSIONIC]] trait. Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. This attack gains ranged.

name: Domino
text: [star] Response: After you use one of Domino's basic powers, swap a card in your hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Psi-Flail Strike
text: Play only if your hero has the [[PSIONIC]] trait. Hero Response (attack): After you defend against an enemy attack, deal 3 damage to that enemy and stun it.

name: Telekinesis
text: Play only if your hero has the [[PSIONIC]] trait. Max 1 per player. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Telekinesis and spend [mental][mental] resources → deal 3 damage to an enemy.
